paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for the TTR gene, including penetrance data.

patients.demographics: Age: 75.7 ± 8.1 years; Male: 86.4%; Ethnicity: Predominantly Caucasian

functional_data.summary: The p.(V142I) variant is associated with hereditary transthyretin cardiac amyloidosis.

variants.additional_notes: The variant is prevalent in patients with hereditary transthyretin cardiac amyloidosis.

patients.demographics: Age: Not specified; Male: Not specified; Ethnicity: Not specified

functional_data.summary: The p.(Thr80Ala) variant is associated with hereditary transthyretin cardiac amyloidosis.

variants.additional_notes: The variant is prevalent in patients with non-p.(V142I) hATTR-CA.
key_quotes: Patients in the non-p.(V142I) hATTR-CA subgroup had the following variants: p.(Thr80Ala) = 131.

patients.demographics: Age: Not specified; Male: Not specified; Ethnicity: Not specified

functional_data.summary: The p.(Val50Met) variant is associated with hereditary transthyretin cardiac amyloidosis.

variants.additional_notes: The variant is prevalent in patients with non-p.(V142I) hATTR-CA.
key_quotes: Patients in the non-p.(V142I) hATTR-CA subgroup had the following variants: p.(Val50Met) = 21.

patients.demographics: Age: Not specified; Male: Not specified; Ethnicity: Not specified

functional_data.summary: The p.(Ser97Tyr) variant is associated with hereditary transthyretin cardiac amyloidosis.

variants.additional_notes: The variant is prevalent in patients with non-p.(V142I) hATTR-CA.
key_quotes: Patients in the non-p.(V142I) hATTR-CA subgroup had the following variants: p.(Ser97Tyr) = 16.
